00049 TcpManager::TcpManager(Repository* repository) : repository(repository), exiting(false)
00050 {
00051     pthread_mutex_init( &mutex, NULL );
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool TcpManager::init()
00055 {
00056     Session* session = repository->createSession("tcpPortBinder",
00057         "TCP socket binding session", "/");
00058     bool done = false;
00059 
00060     while (!done) {
00061         try {
00062             session->start();
00063             session->lock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, WHERE("Getting my address"));
00064             RYellowPages* yp = session->getObjectAsL<RYellowPages>(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00065             if (yp->getSocketAddress(Network::TCP_IP, session->getRepositoryName(), myAddr)) {
00066                 session->setIntB(PROPERTY_TCP_LISTENING_PORT, myAddr.getPort());
00067                 done = true;
00068             }
00069             else {
00070                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("I cannot find my address in the yellow pages");
00071             }
00072             session->unlock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00073 
00074             if (!done) {
00075                 session->end();
00076                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Something wrong in loading TCP listening port");
00077                 delete session;
00078                 return false;
00079             }
00080             session->end();
00081         }
00082         catch (const SessionException& e) {
00083             session->terminate();
00084             delete session;
00085             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00086             return false;
00087         }
00088     }
00089 
00090     delete session;
00091 
00092     done = false;
00093     while ( !done ) {
00094         try {
00095             serverSocket.bind( myAddr.getPort() );
00096             done = true;
00097         } catch ( Network::NetException& netexc ) {
00098             RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Failure in binding TCP Server: " << netexc.fullwhat() );
00099             sleep( 4 );
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     return true;
00104 }
00105 
00106 bool TcpManager::start()
00107 {
00108     if (!createThread(&tcpListenerThreadId,
00109         (void*(*)(void*))tcpListenerThreadFn, this,
00110         "TCP listener thread")) return false;
00111     if (!createThread(&tcpAutomaticPeerCreatorThreadId,
00112         (void*(*)(void*))tcpAutomaticPeerCreatorThreadFn,
00113         this, "TCP automatic peer creator thread")) return false;
00114     return true;
00115 }

00117 bool TcpManager::areYouInterested(const RDK2::Object* obj)
00118 {
00119     const RNetMessage* message;
00120     if (((message = dynamic_cast<const RNetMessage*>(obj)) != 0)
00121     && (Network::TCP_IP == message->getNetProtocol())) {
00122         istringstream iss(message->getAddressees());
00123         string tmp;
00124         while (iss >> tmp) {
00125             if (peerMap.find(tmp) == peerMap.end()) return true;
00126             else if (peerMap[tmp]->getStatus() != CONNECTED) return true;
00127         }
00128     }
00129     return false;
00130 }
00131 
00132 void TcpManager::tcpAutomaticPeerCreator()
00133 {
00134     tcpAutomaticPeerCreatorSession = repository->createSession("tcpAutoPeerCreator",
00135         "TCP automatic peer creator session", "/");
00136     Session* session = tcpAutomaticPeerCreatorSession;
00137 
00138     SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00139     session->queueSubscribe(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00140     session->queueSetInterests(PROPERTY_OUTBOX, this);
00141     session->listen(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00142     SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00143 
00144     set<string> peersCreatedNow;
00145 
00146     while (session->wait(), !exiting) {
00147         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00148 
00149         vector<const RDK2::Object*> q = session->queueFreeze(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00150         for (size_t i = 0; i < q.size(); i++) {
00151             const RNetMessage* msg = dynamic_cast<const RNetMessage*>(q[i]);
00152             if (msg) {
00153                 istringstream iss(msg->getAddressees());
00154                 string tmp;
00155                 while (iss >> tmp) {
00156                     if (tmp == session->getRepositoryName()) {
00157                         session->queuePush(PROPERTY_INBOX, msg->clone());
00158                     }
00159                     else if (peerMap.find(tmp) == peerMap.end()) {
00160                         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("We have a TCP message for '%s', we will try to connect",
00161                             tmp.c_str());
00162                         session->tryConnectTo(Network::TCP_IP, tmp);
00163                         // at this point, a peer manager should have been created
00164                         if (peerMap.find(tmp) != peerMap.end()) {
00165                             peersCreatedNow.insert(tmp);
00166                             RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Putting the first message in sender queue");
00167                             RNetMessage* msgCloned =
00168                                 new RNetMessage(tmp, msg->getSender(), msg->getType(),
00169                                 msg->getNetProtocol(), msg->getPayload()->clone());
00170                             // the message arrives directly in the sender outbox
00171                             // and only in his outbox
00172                             session->queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX, msgCloned);
00173                             // in this way the message is not lost FIXME queue size!
00174                         }
00175                         else {
00176                             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("tryTcpConnectWith failed in creating the "
00177                                 "peer manager, messages for this peer are lost");
00178                         }
00179                     }
00180                     else if (find(peersCreatedNow.begin(), peersCreatedNow.end(), tmp)
00181                     != peersCreatedNow.end()) {
00182                         // there is a peer manager for this message, but we
00183                         // created it now, so the message have to be put in his
00184                         // outbox
00185                         RNetMessage* msgCloned =
00186                             new RNetMessage(tmp, msg->getSender(), msg->getType(),
00187                             msg->getNetProtocol(), msg->getPayload()->clone());
00188                         // the message arrives directly in the sender outbox
00189                         // and only in his outbox
00190                         session->queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX, msgCloned);
00191                     }
00192                 }
00193             }
00194         }
00195 
00196         SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00197 
00198         peersCreatedNow.clear();
00199     }
00200 
00201     SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00202     session->queueUnsubscribe(PROPERTY_OUTBOX);
00203     SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00204     delete session;
00205 }
00206 
00207 TcpManager::~TcpManager()
00208 {
00209     exiting = true;
00210     serverSocket.unbind();
00211     pthread_join(tcpListenerThreadId, 0);
00212 
00213     tcpAutomaticPeerCreatorSession->wakeUp();
00214     pthread_join(tcpAutomaticPeerCreatorThreadId, 0);
00215 
00216     pthread_mutex_lock( &mutex );
00217 
00218     std::map<std::string, PeerManager*>::iterator iter;
00219     PeerManager* temp;
00220     while ( !peerMap.empty() ) {
00221         iter = peerMap.begin();
00222         temp = iter->second;
00223         peerMap.erase( iter );
00224         delete temp;
00225     }
00226     
00227     invalidSet.clear();
00228     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("TCP manager closed");
00229 
00230     pthread_mutex_unlock( &mutex );
00231     pthread_mutex_destroy( &mutex );
00232 }
00233 
00234 bool TcpManager::tryConnectTo( const string& peerName, time_t timeout )
00235 {
00236     RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Trying connection with %s", peerName.c_str());
00237     if ( exiting ) {
00238         DOUT( "PeerSet::connect invoked on " << peerName << "but endOfWorkEnabled" )
00239         return false;
00240     }
00241 
00242     if ( peerName == repository->getRepositoryName() ) {
00243         RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "NONONONONO, AN OPERATOR IS USING DRUGS!!!!! I CANNOT CONNECT TO MYSELF, "
00244             "USE SOME SHARED DATA INSTEAD OF PISS ME OFF!!!!" );
00245         return false;
00246     }
00247 
00248     Network::InetAddress addr;
00249     if ( !getAddress( peerName, addr ) ) {
00250         DOUT( "Asked a connection for " << peerName << " but no address present" );
00251         return false;
00252     }
00253 
00254     pthread_mutex_lock( &mutex );
00255     
00256     if ( peerMap.find( peerName ) == peerMap.end() ) {
00257         DOUT( "Connect: Creating a peer manager for " << peerName );
00258         PeerManager* temp = new PeerManager( peerName, *this, NULL, timeout );
00259         peerMap.insert( make_pair( peerName, temp ) );
00260         invalidSet.erase( peerName  );
00261     } else {
00262         DOUT( "Asked a connection for " << peerName << " but manager already present" );
00263     }
00264     
00265     pthread_mutex_unlock( &mutex );
00266 
00267     return true;
00268 }
00269 
00270 Network::ConnectionStatus TcpManager::getConnectionStatusWith(const string& peerName)
00271 {
00272     map<string, PeerManager*>::iterator it = peerMap.find(peerName);
00273     if (it == peerMap.end()) return NOT_CONNECTED;
00274     else return it->second->getStatus();
00275 }
00276 
00277 bool TcpManager::getAddress( const string& peerName, Network::InetAddress& address )
00278 {
00279     bool addressok = false;
00280     repository->lock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, WHERE("Getting my address"));
00281     RYellowPages* yp = repository->getObjectAsL<RYellowPages>(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00282     addressok = yp->getSocketAddress(Network::TCP_IP, peerName, address);
00283     repository->unlock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00284     return addressok;
00285 }

00287 void TcpManager::tcpListener()
00288 {
00289 #ifdef TcpManager_listener_DEBUG
00290     #warning TcpManager_listener_DEBUG enabled ( A lot of debug )
00291     #define LDOUT(a) { RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("PeerSet::accept: "<<a) }
00292 #else
00293     #define LDOUT(a)
00294 #endif
00295     //InetAddress myAddr;
00296 
00297     Session* session = repository->createSession("tcpListener", "TCP listener session", "/");
00298 
00299     RDK_INFO_STREAM( "TCP server ready on port " << myAddr.getPort() );
00300 
00301     unsigned short myUdpPort = 0;
00302     SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00303     myUdpPort = (unsigned short) session->getInt(PROPERTY_UDP_PORT);
00304     SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00305 
00306     while (!exiting) {
00307         TCPSocket* newSocket = NULL;
00308         while ( !newSocket && !exiting ) {
00309             try {
00310                 DOUT( "Waiting for incoming TCP connection on port " <<
00311                     serverSocket.getAddress().getPort() );
00312                 newSocket = serverSocket.accept();
00313             } catch ( Network::NetException& netexc ) {
00314                 if (!exiting) { RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Error on accept: " << netexc.fullwhat() ); }
00315                 bool done = false;
00316                 while ( !done && !exiting ) {
00317                     try {
00318                         serverSocket.rebind();
00319                         done = true;
00320                     } catch ( Network::NetException& netexc ) {
00321                         RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Failure in rebinding TCP Server: " << netexc.fullwhat() );
00322                         sleep( 4 );
00323                     }
00324                 }
00325             }
00326         }
00327     
00328         if ( exiting ) break;
00329 
00330         LDOUT( "Connection accepted from " << newSocket->getAddress().getIPAddress() << ":" <<
00331             newSocket->getAddress().getPort() );    
00332     
00333         // Take or not take decision
00334         pthread_mutex_lock( &mutex );
00335         try {
00336             string peerName;
00337             unsigned short peerUdpPort;
00338             // Good received name
00339             if ( ( *newSocket >> peerName >> peerUdpPort ) ) {
00340                 DOUT( "Received name from peer: " << peerName <<
00341                     " (his udp port is " << peerUdpPort << ")");
00342                 // In case of lesser priority
00343                 if ( peerName > repository->getRepositoryName() ) {
00344                     // Sending connection accept
00345                     if (*newSocket << repository->getRepositoryName() << " " << myUdpPort << endl) {
00346                         std::map<std::string, PeerManager*>::iterator iter = peerMap.find( peerName );
00347                         // Setting new connection
00348                         if ( iter != peerMap.end() ) {
00349                             iter->second->setNewConnection( newSocket );
00350                         }
00351                         else {
00352                             // Creating new manager
00353                             peerMap.insert( make_pair( peerName,
00354                                 new PeerManager( peerName, *this, newSocket ) ) );
00355                         }
00356                         Network::InetAddress udpAddress = newSocket->getAddress();
00357                         udpAddress.setPort(peerUdpPort);
00358                         addUdpPort(peerName, udpAddress, session);
00359                     }
00360                     else {
00361                         RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Connection arrived, but handshake failed with "
00362                             << peerName );
00363                     }
00364                 }
00365                 // In case of greater priority
00366                 else if ( peerName < repository->getRepositoryName() ) {
00367                     // Connection present refusing
00368                     if ( peerMap.find( peerName ) != peerMap.end() ) {
00369                         DOUT( "Incoming connection from " << peerName << " refused" );
00370                         delete newSocket;
00371                     }
00372                     // Connection non present refusing
00373                     else if ( *newSocket << repository->getRepositoryName()
00374                             << " " << myUdpPort << endl) {
00375                         peerMap.insert( make_pair( peerName,
00376                             new PeerManager( peerName, *this, newSocket ) ) );
00377                         Network::InetAddress udpAddress = newSocket->getAddress();
00378                         udpAddress.setPort(peerUdpPort);
00379                         addUdpPort(peerName, udpAddress, session);
00380                     }
00381                     else {
00382                         RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Connection arrived, but handshake failed with "
00383                             << peerName );
00384                     }
00385                 }
00386                 else {
00387                     RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "DUPE ERROR, ARRIVED A MESSAGE FROM MYSELF!!! "
00388                         "OPERATOR STOP TO DRINK BEFORE WORK!!!!" );
00389                     delete newSocket;
00390                 }
00391             }
00392             else {
00393                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Connection arrived, but was lost before the "
00394                     "arrive of the peerName" );
00395                 delete newSocket;
00396             }
00397         }
00398         catch ( Network::NetException& netexc ) {
00399             RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Non recoverable exception during handshake "
00400                 "(destroying connection): " <<
00401                 netexc.fullwhat() );
00402             delete newSocket;
00403         }
00404     
00405         pthread_mutex_unlock( &mutex );
00406 
00407     }
00408     serverSocket.unbind();
00409     delete session;
00410 #undef LDOUT
00411 }
00412 
00413 void TcpManager::addUdpPort(const string& peerName, const Network::InetAddress& udpAddress, Session* session)
00414 {
00415     bool done = false;
00416     //udpset.insert( peerName );
00417     while (!done) {
00418         try {
00419             session->start();
00420             session->lock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, HERE);
00421             RYellowPages* pages = session->getObjectAsL<RYellowPages>(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00422             if (pages) {
00423                 pages->newHost(Network::UDP_IP, peerName, udpAddress);
00424                 done = true;
00425                 RDK_INFO_STREAM("Connection accepted from " << peerName << " (UDP port " <<
00426                     udpAddress.getPort() << ") ");
00427             }
00428             else {
00429                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Why the devil this yellowpages is 0?");
00430             }
00431             session->unlock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00432             session->end();
00433         }
00434         catch (const SessionException& exc) {
00435             session->terminate();
00436             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Error on loading ypages " << exc.what());
00437         }
00438         if (!done) sleep(4);
00439     }
00440 }
